summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing an agreement with the United States Department of Agriculture for financial assistance for the operation of a food service program for day care homes; authorizing contracts with day care homes in connection therewith; establishing certain positions in the Department of Human Resources; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1977 Budget of said Department; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
